titleStmt.title: The exact constable with his original & power in the offices of church wardens, overseers of the poor, surveyors of the highwayes, treasurers of the county stock, and other inferior officers as they are established, both by the common laws and statutes of this realm. By E.W. of Grays-Inn Esq;
titleStmt.author: Wingate, Edmund, 1596-1656.

editionStmt.edition: The second edition, with many useful additions.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed for H. Brome at the Gun in Ivy-Lane,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
